ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Somethign I would like you all to evaluate
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool!  How do you get that software? How much does it cost? I would love to learn how to do stuff like that. I got a download of a Flash program and I tried to
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! How do you get that software? How much does it cost?
I would love to learn how to do stuff like that. I got a download of a Flash program and I tried to make something with it but it kept saying I performed an illegal operation and crashed.
Yeah, I love the various scenes. They are awesome.
And the beggar thing was great! My brother came and looked over my shoulder as I was watching it. He loved it too. I had never heard that song before and I really liked it.
Makes me want to get the software and do something like that for my guild. I need to get more guild pictures...
Thanks for sharing that!
luv,
-Su

======== At 2004-02-15, 01:25:00 you wrote: ========

Hi Su and thanks .

I used Macromedia Flash MX Professional 2004 to create the film the music
addition was just a simple thing of adding it into one of teh frams and
letting it start where I wanted it to.

As for the pics I can thank my guildmates for most of the pics I just
arranged them in a way that I thought would work best for what I had in mind
as I was picking them out and I tried to have some of the effects to be
timed with various parts of the song itself. One of my guildmates said
that they liked the part where my Char is on his Drogmor and raises his epic
to point at what I would like to imagine was a mob we were getting ready
to attack. In actuality we were getting set up for a Raid in Plane of Sky
(air) and I had actually targeted the dwarf in front of me and used him for
the point reference hehe.

My actual favorite though out of all of that was the very last frame lol
where you can replay teh film lol. that is my illustyrious guild leader lol
and one of our trade skillers suggested that he dye his armor pink for April
Foll's and someone took teh screenshot of him dancing in his pink outfit
lol and as soon as I saw it I knew I wanted that one to be at teh end of
the film. At the time I planned this I hadn't thought about even doing a
replay feature till I was nearly done withteh film and it took me a week to
figure out how to keep the film form ending completely and going back to the
start of the actual film and not to the prelaod portion. Byt the time I was
done with the film I think my brain went LD for a couple of days lol just
before I posted it for public viewing lol

my next favorite is where i am nekkid in PoK waiting for a rezz and one of
our wizzies was there with me and in the movie I just had to make fun of the
beggars that are so prevalent in the Eq world lol

Haly


--
